Row.Text: The Bull Moose
Wants to settle near high appeal tiles and build high appeal districts and wonders, and likes those who do the same. Dislikes anyone that embraces low appeal territory.
I hear you’ve got some capital hiking over there.
We are defined by how we live with our surroundings. Remember that.
(You have many high Appeal areas within your empire)
(You do not have enough high Appeal areas within your empire.)
If I must choose between righteousness and peace, I choose righteousness.
I wanted to avoid this, you know, but your idea of peace left me no choice.
Congratulations. Instead of the United States of America, your nation will go far.
I can't say no to that.
We are not interested at this time.
You have earned my respect. Shall we declare our friendship?
You have my thanks.
That is too bad.
I welcome your delegation to the great United States of America.
We must decline.
It’s good to see you. My diplomatic delegation should be arriving soon with some fresh-baked apple pies. I’m sure you’ll give them a warm welcome.
How dare you!
I cannot abide a ruler without dignity, and the world must be made aware. (Denounces You)
Welcome to the United States of America. If you conduct yourself well, you can consider us friends.
We have a city nearby. Would you like to visit? I could show you the stuffed bears that are now so popular.
I can't say no to that.
I’d like to exchange information about our capitals; promote free trade between our nations, and all that.
Go on, then.
You have earned my respect. Shall we form an alliance?
It is the duty of our nation to guard its own rights and interests. That work is done; let us go forth in peace.
You cannot be serious!
I protected the nation’s interests and guarded our rights. That work is done. Now, we can live in peace.
We are happy to open up our borders to your units.
We are not interested at this time.
Will you allow our units to cross through your territory?
You march your troops so close to our borders that I am beginning to question your integrity.
Thanks for keeping the peace on the continent. Bully for you!
(You have kept the peace on his home continent)
No man is above the law. It behooves you to remember that.
(You have attacked someone on his home continent.)
